glsa.title: PDFlib: Multiple buffer overflows
glsa.synopsis: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows have been reported in PDFlib.

background.p: PDFlib is a library for generating PDF on the fly.

description.p: poplix reported multiple boundary errors in the pdc_fsearch_fopen() function when processing overly long filenames.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send specially crafted content to a vulnerable application using PDFlib, possibly resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All PDFlib users should upgrade to the latest version:
